title: Bans are Killing me
body: Each day when I try to play and get on LOL my ban doesn't get off. I play each day and each day I get on and go into the search lobby I have a temporary ban. The ban never goes off. This was all because I had to go eat dinner with my family. **The bans need to stop I think**.

replies.body:
Maybe you should stop and consider that it is completely and entirely your fault, and correct what you are doing instead of blaming the system.

Dont play a game you are not prepared to play, especially if you are not mature enough to respect the rules.

If you know it is close to a time where you will have to stop playing, you shouldn't start a match.

You are going to be held responsible for ruining games for others, so maybe you should behave responsibly.

EDIT: Also wrong board. This isn't a bug.
The 3 people who picked yes are toxic and get banned frequently xd

You have to play through the 5 Low Priority Queue games *without leaving* to work it off completely; leaving any more games will just get you more and a higher restriction. If you think they are not diminishing properly I recommend asking in [Help & Support](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/osqw6G4M) if they can take a look.

If you want to learn more about the Leaver Buster system and Low Priority Queues, read here; https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ
